website_summaries.verdict: When you need to truly cover up, this reputable brand's zinc protection that blocks 98% of UVs has your back.
pros: A stylish and sensible cover up, this is great for boating, cooler sunny days or for anyone who needs to block out the sun
Comfortable cotton and bamboo with some Spandex
Hood with draw cord, pockets and side vents
cons: This comes at a much higher price point

customer_reviews.title: The cotton is very soft and smooth/ great quality. I will mention that I also ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute, well made coverup that works well in bright sunlight to protect from the sun. The cotton is very soft and smooth/ great quality. I will mention that I also ordered the white and it was much smaller than the stripe. Beware of inconsistent sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverup. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is heavier than I expected but I like it after coming out wet into the cool air. I get compliments when I wear the coverup. I like knowing that I am getting extra sun blockage. Would feel comfortable wearing it running into the store.
customer_reviews.author: Brown dog

customer_reviews.title: Great cover-up
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cover-up. I haven't had a chance to wear it out on the boat yet but I'm looking forward to it. It looks just like the picture. The fabric is very soft yet not too thin. I'm 5'2" and 127 lbs and the small fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverup!
customer_reviews.text: I own several beach coverups from Coolibar and this one is my favorite. It's lightweight, provides sun-protection, and looks great on. I do always go up a size in their coverups and find that i get the best fit this way.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable coverup to help prevent sunburn
customer_reviews.text: I burn easy and wanted a coverup for walking the beach while on vacation. This coverup was perfect. It was comfortable, fit well, stylish, and helped keep me from burning. It slipped on and off easily even when wet and it dried fairly quickly. My phone fit in the pocket with no issue as well. I’ll likely buy another of these (or similar) for our next beach vacay.
customer_reviews.author: BRunning

customer_reviews.title: Great little coverup
customer_reviews.text: Great little coverup. Material is a little ticker than i expected, however after a few washes material gets very soft...so soft i have occasionally used as pjs. .... material may be a littlr thick but it is not hot..even in the southern humidity
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, light weight, dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect cover-up. Lightweight, dries quickly, fell at a good length on a petite frame (not too long), and quite flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Catriona

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great dress or tunic
customer_reviews.text: I will buy more in other colors, washes well, I do not put it in the dryer, I hang it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Myers Glower

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover up with Sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like picture. Soft and comfortable. Love the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: yogibear

customer_reviews.title: Cute for beach or casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very attractive, good quality. Pockets are fantastic. Heavy enough weight that it can be worn off beach for casual dining or shopping.
customer_reviews.author: deborah damman

customer_reviews.title: ... a large it’s a bit big but I feel like the medium would be tight
customer_reviews.text: Got a large it’s a bit big but I feel like the medium would be tight. It’s thin so you don’t get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Shajj

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Love the coverage and protection from sun. Fits well, washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look for the sun
customer_reviews.text: Given the reviews from others I thought it would run big but it runs more fitted. I wear a 12 and ordered the medium. It's perfect but no room to grow :)
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Great weight
customer_reviews.text: The weight is great but it runs small, I weigh 120 and am 5'4" and with a bathing suit on, it could be bigger. Taking it to Florida next week, will know more after wearing it in various settings.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Great coverup!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Large, as the reviews suggested it fit properly. I returned the large and ordered an xl as I like a roomy coverup. It's soft and comfortable. I have worn it once and I know I will get plenty of wear. Thinking of ordering another color.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Looks classically beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother in law. She LOVED it. She loved the fit and how she looked in.
customer_reviews.author: SophieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover up to wear to a Great Wolf Lodge indoor water park. I am 6 months post baby and breastfeeding. This cover up made me feel like I had it together, it looks expensive at an affordable price. It also provided easy access to nurse my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: fit well and would be perfect for 85 degrees not 93
customer_reviews.text: It was too hot for the crazy heat we had on our vacation however it was cute, fit well and would be perfect for 85 degrees not 93.
customer_reviews.author: Neptunebch

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Protection but Slightly Too Long for Me
customer_reviews.text: This product fits wonderfully and provided great sun protection. It’s also very good-looking. The only concern I had was with the length. I understand that the product was made targeting a mature audience, but as a young woman I prefer my cover-ups to be a tad short. Other than that, it was wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, and doesn’t make me look like an over expanded can of biscuits.
customer_reviews.text: Gray color, material is awesome for beach wear, big enough even though I’m a fat lard.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fit and Style
customer_reviews.text: This 2X fit great and covers well. The material is forgiving and lightweight. I had many compliments on it. I have worn it into the grocery store after a day at the beach. This is one the best cover-ups. I did find when it gets really hot, it is not as comfortable as cotton, but it does the job of blocking the sun. The pockets are great for holding shells and sea glass.
customer_reviews.author: savinggrace

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this item. Fits great, very comfortable and light enough to wear during the summer. I have other items from Coolibar and will continue to buy their products. They never disappoint in quality but it would be nice if they reduced their prices a little.
customer_reviews.author: Sherril B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got an XXL, but it was too big for me. I'm 5'4" and 180#. I ordered an XL and can't wait to receive it. It is a beautiful product and the material feels so good. I'm excited about taking this on my beach trip!
customer_reviews.author: Lemony Girl

customer_reviews.title: A must have to save your skin
customer_reviews.text: Great sun cover up. Light weight and soft. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reno-Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great style and great fir
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Perfect beach cover up that can actually be worn off the beach as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit and breathable material a bit see through so wear a shirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Vani

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't wash well Holds wrinkles which was surprising. Will know more as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Dress First...Coverup Second
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a throw-on dress to run errands or wear to a casual doodah like a cookout. Ended up buying four more. Get tons of compliments and live in them!
customer_reviews.author: Arend W. Boterenbrood

customer_reviews.title: Coolibar UPF 50
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a nice coverall but too tight fitting. It still seems like a good product & I subsequently bought a different style and size by Coolibar UPF50.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Barlowbrown

customer_reviews.title: I expected better quality. There were many frayed hems and hole ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the coverup, I expected better quality. There were many frayed hems and hole in the back discovered while on vacation. The appearance and lightweight feeling was great.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! It falls nicely and is so comfortable. Can wear with leggings or at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Pdj

customer_reviews.title: Swimsuit cover-up!
customer_reviews.text: Sleeves & body seem extra long otherwise it appears to run pretty close to size. It's nice and light in weight and should be a good swim suit cover-up.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Becker

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit so much that I pursued a second one. It’s not too tight and shows just the right amount of skin so that it’s classy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Attractive. Easy to go from beach to store. Versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover up
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover up. It has been great sun protection and it has help up to multiple washing bc my kids constantly get me dirty. It is flattering and so easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Five
customer_reviews.text: Got three new coverups. Had before. They are darling. Made great ! Wash great! Love them! Cute on and could wear with pants. Long and flattering. Got royal blue and grey striped and black! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protective and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love SPF value, length shields thighs nicely, true to size 2x
customer_reviews.author: DebzDesign

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hot days at the lake
customer_reviews.text: Heavy fabric. Not good for hot days at the lake. Doesn't dry fast. Soft fabric though. Made well.
customer_reviews.author: Wickmomma

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit for my 145 weight
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and flattering. Not too short, but still above knees. Adorable for a cruise or anywhere if you are older.
customer_reviews.author: ursula hinchey

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Good for days that are a little cooler or when I want to cover up after getting a little too much sun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Antinori

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful styling and fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and ordering my third. We are staying at a stylish resort which requires cover ups. My grand daughter and daughter look amazing and well dressed in them. You'd never know they are cover ups. I love the pockets and the 50 + is an added blessing
customer_reviews.author: Violet Trout

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Swim Cover-up
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim cover up. It fits perfect and is not to short in length. I loved it so much I bought 5 others in different colors!👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived smelling like smoke
customer_reviews.text: Item smelled so strong of smoke (like it had been in a fire) that I had to return it. AND I had to pay to ship it back even though the listing says FREE RETURNS.
customer_reviews.author: Drbrain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect after ordering and wearing one. I ordered a second one. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Friskie Kingrey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bathing suit cover that can also be used as a dress.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for the beach -- and not worrying about sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to wearing this on the beach so I don't burn. I like the feel and the fit, so I think it will always be in my beach bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Stretchy, quality material. Bought another in a different color and can't wait to wear on vacation. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Moore

customer_reviews.title: A great cover-up for a cruise
customer_reviews.text: A bit snug in the bust. I am exchanging it for the next size up. A great cover-up for a cruise. Excellent quality of material and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfortable and nice enough to wear off the beach
customer_reviews.author: saravdm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for vacation to the beach. Was worth the money to not get sunburned and fit flatteringly.
customer_reviews.author: Detra

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews before buying and I'm glad I did for the other Coolibar items I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying and I'm glad I did for the other Coolibar items I bought but for some reason this beach cover-up was more true to size and was too small on me - ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Luffel

customer_reviews.title: really cute top. could be worn as a very ...
customer_reviews.text: really cute top. could be worn as a very short dress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality and fits perfectly. Absolutely what I wanted to put on after a day in the sun and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool, comfortable, not to short and not too long. Not worn it yet, so they is to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: First i dont really understand the hubbub about the pockets...and i dont understand why you would swim in it ( which apparently fills up the pockets) so....that all said...the pockets are fine. But i didn't swim in it so.... Now the size...i would say it is true to size. Perhaps they changed the fit based upon some reviews. The fabric is comfy...and mine survived florida sun for several days without fading and i didnt burn so that covers some of it. Hmmm perhaps the fading everyone mentioned has something to do with swimming in it? To fill the pockets with water? But i digress....GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice as a cover-up. Perfect weight for warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: mary berry

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and soft
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable. I thought I might be too warm in the Florida sun with this, but it light weight enough to feel ok. I love the look and security of the extra sun protection. It seems to run a bit small because I ordered a large for extra room, but it fits just right; so my regular mediums would have been snug
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Joly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Vey comfortable and fits just the way I wanted it to! I may even have to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: callip@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need to reorder 2 sizes smaller because the cover up dress was huge!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: I am looking forward to using it at beach and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to using it at beach and cruise. Thanks for protecting us who buy ur clothing from sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! I'm 5'11 size 18 and it fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I'm 5'11 size 18 and it fit just right. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TWinCA

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice
customer_reviews.text: I just received this coverup. I am excited to try it out on my upcoming beach vacation. I am a little concerned about the white getting dirty, but wanted to have a cooler color for the sun. The fit is great! I am 5'7" and thin build and i bought the small. I am happy with the look and fit.
customer_reviews.author: zdemoguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cover up. Lightweight, so it's not too warm in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tournas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pockets really don't work with hoodie....rest of cover up is cute. Surprised Coolibar ok'd these pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Di Ann

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I wore this nearly every day of our trip - as a tunic and a swimsuit cover up. I wore it on the plane too. So comrforable and sylish.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover up
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, perfect for the pool and beach
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I like it, however haven't worn it yet
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however haven't worn it yet. I read the reviews and ordered a small but it's too clingy. I'm returning it for a Medium. I ordered another brand also, but that one is way too thick. This one is a good weight to try to wear on a hot beach so I'll try the next size up. UPDATE: Got the white in a medium instead of small. Feels and looks great. It may be too hot for me to wear it on the beach in 95 degree Florida summer-heat, but the rest of the year, it will look great and protect my skin, too.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: but the fit and style look great. The pockets are a bit big and floppy ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried this out in the sun/on the water yet, but the fit and style look great. The pockets are a bit big and floppy though. I don't think I would swim or go in the water with this on but if I did, the floppy pockets might cause some drag. Looking forward to seeing how it works for sun protection and how quickly it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

product_meta.title: Coolibar UPF 50+ Women's Catalina Beach Cover-Up Dress - Sun Protective
feature_bullets: ZnO™ fabric: Super soft against the skin, lightweight, cool and comfortable with the highest quality zinc oxide protection
Hooded V-neckline with drawcord, loose front pockets, side seam vents, straight hem; 34 inch body length (size medium) falls to mid-thigh
Easy care: machine wash, tumble dry; Imported
Recommended for everyday leisure, and relaxing by the pool, lake or ocean
